Package game.actions

  • Class Summary
    Class Description
    AttackAction
    Special Action for attacking other Actors.
    BuyAction
    An Action type for buying an Item from another Actor
    ConsumeAction
    Action for consuming items
    DigAction
    An Action allowing an Actor to dig
    EndGameAction
    Action for ending the game
    FireAttackAction
    At attack that leaves a lingering flame on the ground
    GiveItemAction
    like a trade action, except a gift :).
    GoToFountainAction
    Action which directs Enemies to go to a Fountain (and then later drink from the fountain)
    PickUpCoinAction
    A variation on the PickUpItem class that specifies what happens when a Coin is picked up
    ReanimateAction
    Reanimates a fallen Actor as a Zonbi
    ResetAction
    An Action type for resetting the game
    SpeakAction
    An Action for speaking to another Actor that CanSpeak
    SuicideAction
    An Action for when a mob suicides Use this to implement waiting or similar actions in game clients.
    TeleportAction
    Action for teleportation
    WalkToHigherGroundAction
    This is what happens when you move while being affected by - for example - a power star
